description:
■GAME SYSTEM
This game is an escape-the-room game (mystery-adventure game).
*Point the screen with a cursor to solve riddles, and story goes on.

■STORY
A must-go for cat lovers 
lies in a mountain village

My friend's suggestion 
has brought me 
to a traditional folk house

While I was sitting by a sunken hearth 
to keep myself warm,

I got sleepy and dozed off……

How long have I slept?
I woke up to seeー

Something unbelievable
name: Escape Game The Old Folk House
intro: I paid a visit to a traditional folk house in a mountain village. I dozed off by the hearth…… I woke up to find an unbelievable situation……！？
